title: Efftee's Australia
brief_description: For the first time on video - the documentary output of Australia’s first talkie studio - Frank Thring senior’s Melbourne based Efftee Productions. All of these “shorts” have been transferred directly to video from 35 mm nitrate negatives and prints. Rated: G
